text: Press release has been sent to GeekWire - although Katherine at PDC has already been tweeting :simple_smile:

I had dinner last night with an old friend who just started a job this week as a developer with a company called Tripwire across the river. They do cyber security of some kind and it sounds like they have their sights set pretty heavily on IoT stuff. He'll be sharing info about the event with his team. Not sure what that means to anyone but love that Portland is such a small town.
